TopicTitle: Gene Wilder Has Sadly Died Today

Articles.Content: I bare bad news, Gene Wilder (Imdb- http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000698/ ) has sadly past away today at the age of 83. Many of the younger users may simply know him as the old Willy Wonka, however he played in many many movies such as Young Frankenstein,Blazing Saddles, See No Evil, Hear No Evil, The Producers and so on. He was a fantastic actor that mesmerized many and he will always be one of my favorite actors. He is at least now, with the best  .

"No matter what you hear in there, no matter how I beg you, no matter how terribly I may scream, do not open this door or you will undo everything I have worked for. Do you understand? Do not open this door!"

One of the funniest movies ever made. I may have to watch that again tonight.

A true legend.

Most have probably seen Charlie Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory, but Blazing Saddles and The Producers are must-watch films too imo.

Edited August 29, 2016 by pxi
He was good.  For those that have not seen Young Frankenstein, it was intentionally filmed in B & W instead of color to mimic the original Frankenstein movie from the 1930s.
Damn.  I can't find either The Producers or Young Frankenstein on my shelf.
Rest in Peace Gene Wilder. He was one of my favourite actors, and one of my favourite memes.
RIP. I remember watching Young Frankenstein when I was 7 or so. Hilarious!
